column4: anyone want to help a newbie out with getting DVD playback up?
When i play any video it freezes the system and eats the cursor
I have tried totem and Mplayer
both do the same thing
VLC?
yes, it's in synaptic
apt-get vlc
im not even positive what a codec is, im pretty newbie
sorry about the misspelling, did you edit your sources.list?
i dont think so
the only thing i changed was my respositories list
right, that's it
look here http://ubuntuguide.org/#dvdplayback I'll be back in a sec
then yes, i have many repositores
says i already have the newest version
sorry, the codecs off of ubuntuguide.org?
mine are updated, im installing the nvidia drivers
ok, I'm a little behind, sorry
ill be right back i was about to restart and see if the new drivers help
still around?
I guess not
sorry, I'm mulitasking as about as proficent as Windows
